name: ComparatorPredicate_comparatorPredicateTest
description: Unit tests for the ComparatorPredicate class, focusing on the comparatorPredicate method.

test_cases.name: testComparatorPredicate_WithNonNullComparatorAndCriterion
test_cases.description: Tests the comparatorPredicate method with a non-null comparator and criterion, ensuring the predicate correctly evaluates to true when the input matches the criterion.

test_cases.name: testComparatorPredicate_WithNullComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the comparatorPredicate method with a null comparator, expecting a NullPointerException to be thrown.

test_cases.name: testComparatorPredicate_WithNullCriterion
test_cases.description: Tests the comparatorPredicate method with a null criterion, expecting a NullPointerException to be thrown.
